features.text: Added two new views: Kanban and Filter!
features.reasoning: Kanbans are great for grouping tasks into 'buckets', and filters allow for more-advanced searches across your blocks. You can find these new views in the upper-left of an open board.

features.text: Refreshed the look and feel of the website.
features.reasoning: The old website was clumsy and amateurish, so we felt a redesign was needed. There are still a few places that haven't received the new look, but they'll be updated in the coming releases.

bugs.text: Addressed some performance slowdowns for certain hardware.

tweaks.text: Updated the demos, which included adding Kanban/Filter views.
